## **‚úÖ Logo Updated to Monochrome Dark!**

### **üé® Changes Made:**

**From:** Blue gradient text (`from-blue-600 to-indigo-600`)  
**To:** Monochrome dark text (`text-gray-900`)

### **üîß Updated Design:**

1. **Clean Monochrome Styling**:
   - **Main Logo**: `text-gray-900` (dark gray/black)
   - **Icon Version**: `text-gray-900` for "LT" monogram
   - Removed all gradient classes and transparency effects

2. **Professional Appearance**:
   - Clean, readable dark text
   - Works perfectly on light backgrounds
   - More traditional and professional look
   - Better contrast and accessibility

3. **Maintained Features**:
   - Inter font family (rounded, modern)
   - Bold weight for brand presence
   - Responsive sizing system
   - Clean tracking and spacing

### **üìç Visual Impact:**

- **More Professional**: Classic dark text conveys stability and trust
- **Better Readability**: Higher contrast on white/light backgrounds
- **Cleaner Design**: Less distraction, more focus on content
- **Universal Compatibility**: Works in any design context

The **"Linguala Translate"** logo now appears as clean, bold, monochrome dark text throughout the entire application - in the header, authentication pages, and all other components!
